name: ERON
description: ERON Project is a project created to help underdeveloped areas in the world by providing utility networks. In order to be able to build these utility networks, we have started developing our own blockchain (currently 40 nodes) and our own Dapps â€“ ERON Wallet and ERON B2C Marketplace. ERON is the native utility token that is used for: * Paying fees for processing transactions and storing data. * Running validator nodes on the ERON blockchain. * Used as payment for buying goods/ services on ERON B2C marketplace.
